title: Whistler: Australia's Favourite International Ski Resort
description: You asked for it, and now we've delivered. Experience the snow-capped beauty of Whistler - Australia's favourite international ski resort - with five nights staying at Nita Lake Lodge. Voted the #1 hotel in the area and one of the top five resorts in Canada by Travel + Leisure and Condé Nast, Whistler's only lakefront property is perfectly located for those looking to make fresh tracks down some of the world's best ski slopes and enjoy outdoor activities like hiking and skating before rugging up next to cosy wood fire. Includes daily à la carte breakfasts, welcome cocktails and more for only $1,499 for two adults, valued up to $2,277. Family options also available. Watch the video below.
